body: Honestly why would he even bother to get his kids tested? Granted, it’s possible that he’ll just take the kids entirely, assuming the lawyers involved don’t care about blood. Anyways she straight up admitted on the AV that the kid has no chance of being his.
I hope she gets a worst ending possible.
its either cuck ending, sue and win, or wife beating lmao
"everything crumble"...it implied they are separating.. maybe divorce
Wow Guess someone is gonna get sued the shit out in court....😂.
after getting immune to NTR stuff rather than feeling bad I became more appreciative of the Art and it's really crazy how these artist can think of a story like this anyways this series is cool
This is honestly one of the fucking dumbest stories ever created, I like ntr but most of the authors are fucking retards who can’t make a good story to save their lives

Carn talking about a continuation is kinda funny since there's nowhere to go with it except making him an idiot like the Otome Dori dude or he gets pissed off enough to potentially kill them. I would say that he could simply sue her and the company along with getting a divorce, but that would mean ol' Carn would have to write a competent cheated-on guy and that's never gonna happen, lol.
Lol, just look at the baby on her hand. His hair is oblivious.
Quit pussyfooting around and put it in the cart already! JEEZ!
All I can say is......sucka.....lol...you poor poor bastard.  And she's all too happy to pin all these kids on you.  At least he found out now ha ha...a little late but better than never.
NTR must be good if they include the Protagonists getting revenge

But the question is what is he gonna do now that he knows? I'd say show her the videos I saw get a DNA test, if the kid ain't mine get a divorce and leave her and the kid behind and move on with my life
